subject: Automobile Racing
Traffic Accidents and Safety
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The Nationwide series driver T. J. Bell accidentally drove over the head of his car chief Cory Howe while Howe was making adjustments to the car on pit road in Bristol, Tenn.
snippet: The Nationwide series driver T. J. Bell accidentally drove over the head of his car chief Cory Howe while Howe was making adjustments to the car on pit road in Bristol, Tenn.
